name: Kevin Martinez
persona: Kevin Martinez is a 21-year-old Business Administration student whose academic journey has been challenging, reflected in his CGPA of 1.55. He struggles with motivation and self-discipline, often finding it hard to keep up with coursework and set high academic goals. Despite these challenges, Kevin tends to stay relatively calm during exams, but his overall perseverance and belief in his academic abilities are low. He is aware of his difficulties and hopes to find strategies to improve his performance and regain his confidence.
